prompt:
QUESTION:
Will Jeff Bezos be ranked in the top 2 of the Forbes Real-Time Billionaires List on December 31, 2024?

TODAY'S DATE:
2024-12-10

RESOLUTION CRITERIA:
This question resolves as **Yes** if according to the [Forbes Real-Time Billionaires List](https://www.forbes.com/real-time-billionaires/#482980403d78) Jeff Bezos is in 2nd place or better on December 31, 2024. Otherwise, this question resolves as **No**.

ADDITIONAL CRITERIA:
A tie will count as **Yes**. If the resolution source is unavailable on December 31, 2024, resolution will wait until it is available (at which point it resolves based on the data shown), until January 3, 2025, at which point this question will be **annulled**. For more details on various edge cases regarding availability of or changes to the resolution source, please see Metaculus's ambiguity and annulment policies [here](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#ambiguous-annulled).  

BACKGROUND:
As of October 8, 2024, Elon Musk is ranked first on the list, with $260.8B. Larry Ellison is ranked 2nd, with $211.6 B. Mark Zuckerberg is 3rd, with $205.0 B. Jeff Bezos was 4th, with 200.9B. Bernard Arnault & family
was 5th, with $183.1B. And Warren Buffett with 6th, with $142.2B.

ADDITIONAL BACKGROUND:
To assess the likelihood of Jeff Bezos being ranked in the top 2 of the Forbes Real-Time Billionaires List on December 31, 2024, here are some key points to consider:

## Current Rankings and Net Worth
As of various points in 2024, the rankings and net worth of the top billionaires have fluctuated significantly. In June 2024, Elon Musk was the richest with a net worth of $205.4 billion, followed by Bernard Arnault and then Jeff Bezos with $203.2 billion[1].
By August 2024, Elon Musk's net worth had increased to approximately $222 billion, with Jeff Bezos in the second position with a net worth of about $186 billion[4].
In November 2024, Bezos' net worth was estimated near $230 billion, but he was ranked as the third-richest person, behind Elon Musk and possibly others like Larry Ellison[5].

## Volatility in Net Worth
The net worth of these billionaires can change daily due to fluctuations in stock prices, market conditions, and significant business transactions. This volatility is a critical factor in determining their rankings[1][4].

## Recent Trends
Jeff Bezos has seen significant changes in his net worth over the year. However, as of the latest data available, he was not in the top 2 but rather in the third position[5].

## Base Rates and Historical Context
Historically, the top spots have been traded among a few individuals, including Elon Musk, Jeff Bezos, and Bernard Arnault. This suggests that while Bezos has been in the top 2 before, his position can change rapidly[1][4].

Given these points, it is not clear whether Jeff Bezos will be ranked in the top 2 on December 31, 2024, due to the frequent fluctuations in net worth and the competitive nature of the rankings among the top billionaires. The answer cannot be definitively determined as yes or no based on the current information.

ANSWER: Yes, Amazon's stock price has increased significantly between October 2024 and December 31, 2024.
